thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1898
thread.title: Amanda

author: Amanda
title: Amanda
text: I book all my flights with Flight Hub! I made the mistake of trying another company my friend suggested with my most recent booking. One of my flights was cancelled and then they tried to sell me a new ticket for the same flight for $200 more then my original ticket price (I called immediately after booking online)! I ended up cancelling the whole booking with them and went back with Flight Hub. I have never had this issue with flight hub! They are always friendly and helpful!
